_version.description: Represents UI attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

technology.description: Represents UI technology. The possible values are UI5 (default), WDA, NWBC and URL

deviceTypes.description: Represents device types on which application is running. Supported device types are desktop, tablet and phone

supportedThemes.description: Represents array of supported SAP themes such as sap_hcb, sap_bluecrystal

deviceType.description: Represents device types on which the app is running

desktop.description: Represents indicator whether desktop device is supported, default true

tablet.description: Represents indicator whether tablet device is supported, default true

phone.description: Represents indicator whether phone device is supported, default true
